blurb:
I am a seventh year PhD student at the UC Berkeley School of Information co-advised by Jenna Burrell and Joshua Blumenstock. My research aims to inform the design of more responsible technology and tech policy by leveraging insights of people with lived experience, alongside those of domain experts (e.g., data scientists, policymaker, privacy scholars).

At UC Berkeley, I am affiliated with the Global Policy Lab, AI Policy Hub, and Algorithmic Fairness and Opacity Group.

★ I am on the academic job market (for tenure track positions and postdocs) in 2023-2024!
